item.title: The first post
item.description: This is my first post on my new website built with the R package blogdown, the help of many online help pages, and my lovely husband. I am using Github and Netlify as well. I donâ€™t have the energy to write a post about how I built this, but here is the list of things that caused pain: in my config.toml file I had replaced the baseurl default of baseurl = "
